title: Draven builds?????????????????
body: I like to play  quite a lot of {{champion:119}} but I can't really figure out how to build him in games. I'm always struggling to see what items I should get next because i feel there are quite a lot of them that are good on {{champion:119}}. Someone help me plox

replies.body: Tyler1 has alot of draven guides on his YouTube channel I think it's loltyler1
